description: From German Zugzwang, from Zug (“move”) +‎ Zwang (“compulsion”).

nouns.description: zugzwang (countable and uncountable, plural zugzwangs or zugzwänge)

entries.meaning: (chess) A situation in which a player is forced to make a disadvantageous move.
(figurative) A situation in which someone is forced to make a disadvantageous move
